37 #include "iimoveit/robot_interface.h"
38 
39 namespace iimoveit {
40 
41  RobotInterface::RobotInterface(ros::NodeHandle* node_handle, const std::string& planning_group, const std::string& base_frame)
42  : PLANNING_GROUP_(planning_group),
43  node_handle_(node_handle),
44  move_group_(planning_group),
45  visual_tools_(base_frame),
46  robot_state_(*move_group_.getCurrentState()) {
47  trajectory_publisher_ = node_handle_->advertise<trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory>("PositionJointInterface_trajectory_controller/command", 1);
48  joint_model_group_ = move_group_.getCurrentState()->getJointModelGroup(PLANNING_GROUP_);
49  joint_names_ = move_group_.getJointNames();
50  visual_tools_.deleteAllMarkers();
51  visual_tools_.loadRemoteControl();
52  text_pose_ = Eigen::Affine3d::Identity();
53  text_pose_.translation().z() = 1.50; // above head of iiwa
54 
55  visual_tools_.trigger();
56 
57  ROS_INFO_NAMED("iimoveit", "Reference frame: %s", move_group_.getPlanningFrame().c_str());
58  ROS_INFO_NAMED("iimoveit", "End effector link: %s", move_group_.getEndEffectorLink().c_str());
59  }
60 
61  void RobotInterface::planAndMove(const geometry_msgs::Pose& target_pose, const std::string& pose_name, bool approvalRequired) {
62  move_group_.setPoseTarget(target_pose);
63  visual_tools_.publishAxisLabeled(target_pose, pose_name);
64  moveToCurrentTarget(pose_name, approvalRequired);
65  }
66 
67  void RobotInterface::planAndMove(const geometry_msgs::Pose& target_pose, const std::string& pose_name) {
68  planAndMove(target_pose, pose_name, true);
69  }
70 
71  void RobotInterface::planAndMove(const geometry_msgs::Pose& target_pose, bool approvalRequired) {
72  planAndMove(target_pose, std::string("given pose"), approvalRequired);
73  }
74 
75  void RobotInterface::planAndMove(const geometry_msgs::Pose& target_pose) {
76  planAndMove(target_pose, std::string("given pose"), true);
77  }
78 
79  void RobotInterface::planAndMove(const std::vector<double>& joint_group_positions, const std::string& pose_name, bool approvalRequired) {
80  move_group_.setJointValueTarget(joint_group_positions);
81  moveToCurrentTarget(pose_name, approvalRequired);
82  }
83 
84  void RobotInterface::planAndMove(const std::vector<double>& joint_group_positions, const std::string& pose_name) {
85  planAndMove(joint_group_positions, pose_name, true);
86  }
87 
88  void RobotInterface::planAndMove(const std::vector<double>& joint_group_positions, bool approvalRequired) {
89  planAndMove(joint_group_positions, std::string("given pose"), approvalRequired);
90  }
91 
92  void RobotInterface::planAndMove(const std::vector<double>& joint_group_positions) {
93  planAndMove(joint_group_positions, std::string("given pose"), true);
94  }
95 
96  void RobotInterface::waitForApproval() {
97  visual_tools_.prompt("Continue with moving?");
98  }
99 
100  void RobotInterface::publishTrajectory(const trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory& trajectory) {
101  trajectory_publisher_.publish(trajectory);
102  }
103 
104  void RobotInterface::publishPoseGoal(const geometry_msgs::Pose& target_pose, double duration) {
105  robot_state_.setFromIK(joint_model_group_, target_pose);
106  trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectoryPoint trajectory_point;
107  robot_state_.copyJointGroupPositions(joint_model_group_, trajectory_point.positions);
108  trajectory_point.time_from_start = ros::Duration(duration);
109 
110  trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory single_point_trajectory;
111  single_point_trajectory.joint_names = joint_names_;
112  single_point_trajectory.points.push_back(trajectory_point);
113 
114  trajectory_publisher_.publish(single_point_trajectory);
115  }
116 
117  std::vector<double> RobotInterface::getJointPositions() {
118  return move_group_.getCurrentJointValues();
119  }
120 
121  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped RobotInterface::getPose(const std::string& end_effector_link) {
122  return move_group_.getCurrentPose(end_effector_link);
123  }
124 
125  void RobotInterface::updateRobotState() {
126  robot_state_ = robot_state::RobotState(*move_group_.getCurrentState());
127  }
128 
129  void RobotInterface::moveToCurrentTarget(const std::string& pose_name, bool approvalRequired) {
130  bool success = (bool)move_group_.plan(movement_plan_);
131  ROS_INFO_NAMED("iiwa_test", "Visualizing plan to %s %s", pose_name.c_str(), success ? "" : "FAILED");
132  ROS_INFO_NAMED("iiwa_test", "Visualizing plan as trajectory line");
133  visual_tools_.publishText(text_pose_, "Planning movement to given pose", rvt::WHITE, rvt::XLARGE);
134  visual_tools_.publishTrajectoryLine(movement_plan_.trajectory_, joint_model_group_);
135  visual_tools_.trigger();
136  if (success) {
137  if (approvalRequired) waitForApproval();
138  visual_tools_.publishText(text_pose_, "Moving to pose", rvt::WHITE, rvt::XLARGE);
139  visual_tools_.trigger();
140  move_group_.move();
141  updateRobotState();
142  }
143  }
144 
145 } // namespace iimoveit
